Package com.miniproject.three.services

Interface ICartService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CartServiceImpl
public interface ICartService
Interface for cart services.

  • Method Details

    • addHistory

      void addHistory(Date date, boolean isPaid)
      Adds a history record to the cart's history.
      Parameters:
      date - the date of the transaction
      isPaid - whether the transaction is paid

    • addProductToCart

      void addProductToCart(Product product, int inputQuantity)
      Adds a product to the cart with the specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be added
      inputQuantity - the quantity of the product

    • calculateTotalPrice

      double calculateTotalPrice(Cart cart)
      Calculates the total price of the products in the cart.
      Parameters:
      cart - the cart containing the products
      Returns:
      the total price

    • removeProductFromCart

      void removeProductFromCart(String productId)
      Removes a product from the cart.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product to be removed

    • clearCart

      void clearCart()
      Clears all products from the cart.

    • checkout

      void checkout()
      Checks out the cart, adding the current state to history and clearing the cart.

    • editProductQuantity

      void editProductQuantity(String productId, int quantity)
      Edits the quantity of a product in the cart.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product
      quantity - the new quantity

    • getCart

      Cart getCart()
      Gets the current cart.
      Returns:
      the cart

    • getCartHistory

      List<CartHistory> getCartHistory()
      Gets the history of the cart.
      Returns:
      a list of cart history records
